We've Been AroundSince 1990

That's over 35 years of helping San Diego businesses find good workers. From concert venues to construction sites, we know people who know how to work.

How We Got Started

Back in 1990, we started this company with a pretty simple idea: help San Diego businesses find good workers when they need them. What started as a small operation has grown into something we're pretty proud of.

We got really good at working with the entertainment industry - concert venues, festivals, event companies. Turns out, when you need a crew to load in a stage at 6 AM and everything has to be perfect by showtime, you want people who've done it before.

These days we help all kinds of businesses, but we still keep that same approach: know your people, know your clients, and don't promise what you can't deliver.

Our Journey

Key milestones in our 35+ year history of serving San Diego businesses.

1990

Company Founded

Started as a small local staffing agency focused on serving San Diego businesses.

1995

Entertainment Specialization

Began specializing in entertainment industry staffing for concerts and events.

2000

Expanded Services

Added construction and warehouse staffing to serve diverse business needs.

2010

Technology Integration

Implemented modern systems for faster placement and better service.

2020

Continued Growth

Adapted to changing workforce needs while maintaining our core values.

2024

35+ Years Strong

Celebrating over three decades of reliable staffing solutions.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do and have made us San Diego's most trusted staffing partner.

Reliability

We show up when we say we will, with the workers you need to get the job done.

People First

Both our clients and workers are treated with respect, fairness, and professionalism.

Quality

We maintain high standards in everything we do, from worker screening to customer service.

Responsiveness

Quick response times and flexible solutions for your changing business needs.
